description:
Bill announces a revision to the company’s “Royalty” campaign with a new queen of Forrester Creations being the focus.  Light is shed on the severity of Beth’s condition during a visit to her daughters.  Justin flashes back to a fond memory of when he and Donna were at the height of their high school love affair.  Ridge confesses to Brooke that he doesn’t think he can work at Forrester Creations anymore.

Viewers in the U.S. can watch episodes for free on the CBS Television Network, or for five days after broadcast on cbs.com. Paramount+ is a subscription service. Outside the U.S. broadcasters vary.

SUBSCRIBE ON YOUTUBE
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKtGuhthme2J1QbXab41_WQ?sub_confirmation=1
LIKE ON FACEBOOK
https://www.facebook.com/TheBoldandtheBeautiful/
FOLLOW ON INSTAGRAM
https://www.instagram.com/boldandbeautifulcbs/
FOLLOW ON TWITTER
https://twitter.com/boldinsider

Episode: Oct 27, 2009
Season: 23
Original Air Date: 5679

#BOLDANDBEAUTIFUL #SEASON23 #ALOOKBACK
